Name: Box of Chocolate Covered Strawberries
Description: A heart shaped box full of chocolate covered strawberries.Give it to someone special!

DescriptionLocalization.ko: 초콜렛을 듬뿍 씌운 딸기로 가득 찬 하트모양 상자. 특별한 사람에게 선물하세요!
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine herzförmige Schachtel voller Erdbeeren mit Schokoladenüberzug. Gebe das einem besonderen Menschen!
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 心形盒子里是充满着粉红气息的情人草莓。让最特别的ta感受到你的心意吧~
